SEARCH
Package src.interfaces

Interface IOfficerBookingService

All Known Implementing Classes:
OfficerBookingService
public interface IOfficerBookingService
Interface that defines booking-related operations HDB Officers can perform on eligible applicants.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    bookFlat(HDBOfficer officer, Scanner sc)
    Handles flat booking workflow for an applicant.
    boolean
    bookFlatAndGenerateInvoice(HDBOfficer officer, Applicant applicant)
    Executes booking and invoice generation for the given applicant.
    List<Applicant>
    getBookableApplicants(Project assignedProject)
    Retrieves all applicants eligible for booking in a given project.

  • Method Details

    • getBookableApplicants

      List<Applicant> getBookableApplicants(Project assignedProject)
      Retrieves all applicants eligible for booking in a given project.
      Parameters:
      assignedProject - The officer's assigned project.
      Returns:
      A list of bookable applicants.

    • bookFlat

      void bookFlat(HDBOfficer officer, Scanner sc)
      Handles flat booking workflow for an applicant.
      Parameters:
      officer - The logged-in officer.
      sc - Scanner for input.

    • bookFlatAndGenerateInvoice

      boolean bookFlatAndGenerateInvoice(HDBOfficer officer, Applicant applicant)
      Executes booking and invoice generation for the given applicant.
      Parameters:
      officer - The officer performing the booking.
      applicant - The target applicant.
      Returns:
      True if booking and invoice were successful.
